snippet.title: A Normal Lost Phone - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
RELEASE DATE: 26/01/2017 

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/a-normal-lost-phone/id1181828672?l=fr&ls=1&mt=8

ANDROID: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.accidentalqueens.anormallostphone

STEAM PAGE: http://store.steampowered.com/app/523210/

The OST is also available on BANDCAMP: https://anormallostphone.bandcamp.com/

**********

A Normal Lost Phone is a game about exploring the intimacy of an unknown person whose phone was found by the player. 

The game takes the shape of a narrative investigation: you have to search the phone’s text messages, pictures and applications, in order to learn about its former owner. Through this phone, you uncover Sam’s life, friends, family and relationships, until the evening when they turn 18 and mysteriously disappear. 

**********

"A Normal Lost Phone" (http://www.anormallostphone.com) by Accidental Queens (http://www.accidentalqueens.com)

Published by Plug In Digital Label (http://www.plug-in-digital.com/label)

Trailer sound design by Victoria Guillon

2016-2017 © Accidental Queens - All rights reserved
